alert.note: Alert for Eureka; Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 2:52PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Nevada, including the following counties, Eureka and Lander. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 252 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Coils Creek, Indian Creek, Ferguson Creek, Horse Creek and Callaghan Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Eureka and East Central Lander Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
